prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies the power of dimensions with a unique ring feature.
Show me a playful and mischievous Pokemon that can teleport using magical rings.
Imagine a psychic-type Pokemon with a colorful design and a whimsical appearance.
Generate a Pokemon with a vibrant color palette that represents the balance of dimensions.
Make a whimsical creature that has a round body, playful eyes, and a magical aura.
Design a Pokemon that blends elements of mischief and magic with an enchanting look.
Give me a legendary Pokemon with unique rings that can manipulate space and time.

distinctive_features: Two large rings on either side
